overview: Borders stands strong as a remarkable, action-packed political thriller that centers around todayâ€™s immigration debate in the United States. Such a captivating story unfolds 40 years after the construction of a wall within the southern border of the US.
tagline: In the near future, the US is about to enact a force-field to permanently halt illegal immigration, so smugglers, refugees, and DHS agents go on a mad dash to create their own legacy in a week.
title: Borders
